titles.title: BAD DOGE Act
BAD DOGE Act
Bolstering Americaâ€™s Democracy and Demanding Oversight and Government Ethics Act
To repeal President Donald Trump's January 20, 2025, Executive Order titled "Establishing and Implementing the President's 'Department of Government Efficiency'", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Bolstering Americaâ€™s Democracy and Demanding Oversight and Government Ethics Act or the BAD DOGE Act
This bill provides that Executive Order 14158 (relating to establishing and implementing the President's Department of Government Efficiency) shall have no force or effect.
